description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

One of the most irritating things about Climate activists is that if what they demanded came to fruition, it would have to bypass democracy and be forced on the masses. They don’t care if authoritarian or draconian measures have to be taken, so long as they feel they can control the wind. So it's no shocker that they are promoting the most undemocratic thing by protesting in front of the DNC headquarters, demanding Biden drop out of the race.

title: “Joe it’s time to go": Climate wackos demand Biden drop out before Trump destroys the planet

Self-described "Christian girl" Joy Behar is extremely upset (again) because Trump dared to claim that God was watching over him when he was shot.

Behar claims to have been raised Catholic, and because of that, she believes she is “speaking to fellow Christians” when she blasted Trump for being “unchristian,” as he thanked God for saving his life.

NEW: Self-proclaimed ‘Christian girl’ Joy Behar fumes that Trump suggested that God was watching out for him when a bullet traveling 3
title: Watch: Joy Behar is UNHINGED because Donald Trump thanked God for saving his life
